title: Diamond/Platin Bot Searching for Ranked Team/Esports Clan - [GER]
body:
Dear LoL Comunity,
my friend "**Thaibu**" and I "**Zeitschrift**" are a _Diamond/Plat Bot Lane_ and are _searching for an professional enviorment in an E-sports Clan_. 
If German or international is not relevant, we would really enjoy an good atmosphere for the team we would join. If there are any interest please add ingame Me (Zeitschrift) or my friend (Thaibu), or write in the comments how we can get in contact.
Kind Regards

{{champion:236}}
